$schema.description: The URI of the JSON schema corresponding to the version.

MvcHelperClassName.description: Defines the name of the MVC helpers class (e.g. MVC.Home.Index())

PageHelperClassName.description: Defines the name of the Razor Pages helpers class (e.g. Razor.Home.Index())

LinksHelperClassName.description: Allows you to chnage the name of the helper class in which the links for static files are generated in

StaticFilesPath.description: The root path (relative to project dir) for which links will be generated

UseVirtualPathProcessor.description: Defines if you want to define a custom VirtualPathProcessor funcion

UseProcessedPathForContentLink.description: Defines if the processed path from the VirtualPathProcessor should be used for UrlHelper.Content methods

MakeGeneratedClassesInternal.description: Defines if the generated route classes and the MVC and Links class will be public or internal

GeneratedClassNamespace.description: Defines in which namespace the generated MVC and Links class will exist

EnableSubfoldersInViews.description: Defines if subfolders in the controller's Views folder should be supported

ExcludedStaticFileExtensions.description: A list of file extensions that will be excluded from link generation

ExcludedStaticFileDirectories.description: A list of directories (relative to project dir) that will be excluded from link generation

CustomStaticFileDirectoryAlias.description: A dictionary of aliases for certain directories (relative to project dir)
